title: nI tAn tuNai
sahitya:
(rAgA:  nIlAmbari)  
  nI tAn tuNai nIlAmbari nIlakaNThan manOhari
		(rAgA:  vasantabhairavi)
nI dayavAi ennai Adari nirmala vasantabhairavi
		(rAgA:  gaurimanOhari)


anupallavi

  AdhAramAi ulaganaittum ANDaruL gaurImanOhari
		(rAg  sarasvati)
pAdAravindam paNi sarasvati pADi pOTriDum paramEshvari
		(rAg  shrIranjani)


caraNam    mAtA manamagizhndaruL tara innum vAtA maraipura shrIranjani
mati aNi shankaranin manam kavar mAlini gati nIye mOhanakalyANi
mada mighu mahishan mAnriDa vadam sheida mahimaiyuTra mAyE shrI durgE
mAdar tam tuyar iruLai aghaTriDum mangaLa jyotisvarUpiNi
